title: Best-ever slow cooker chicken chilli
ingredients: ['4 skinless, chicken breast fillets', '450g salsa', '2 teaspoons garlic granules', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 1/2 (198g) tins sweetcorn with peppers', '1 (400g) tin pinto beans']
